name: Bedlam: The Beginning
description:
A True Horror First Person Shooter Role Playing Game

Bedlam The Beginning is the introductory chapter to the Bedlam game series. Dr. Eichmann hates regulatory restraints and would prefer to keep his work discrete. When the Gestapo was disbanded in 1945 the doctor moved his practice to the only place he could be free from regulation... the American mental health system. Now set up just outside Cottonwood Falls, Kansas, his experiments are finally yielding the results the good doctor is looking for.

 Bedlam is a new game series that focuses on horror as well as FPS action and true RPG stat based gameplay.

Level up to increase:
Sight or distance you can attack an enemy
Agility or your speed when attacking or evading 
Vitality or your ability to take damage
Power or your ability to do damage

Have a conversation or read through Dr. Eichmann's notes to learn more about the story.

Shop at the bot shop

The game is complete but I will be updating some aspects and adding difficulty modes. This is the first in a series with more to come.
